website_summaries.verdict: Well-constructed and styled nicely for nautical-themed rooms, but complicated to put together.
pros: Attractive style and a fairly sturdy build, especially at its price point
Responsive manufacturer service if warranty repair is needed
cons: Very complex to put together, with lots of small parts
Color is not exactly as described
A few reports of incorrect parts on arrival

customer_reviews.title: For the price no complaints!
customer_reviews.text: What's the deal??? I've seen some bad reviews talking about how hard it was to assemble. Now I'm not a handy man by no stretch at all but it literally took me 2 hours tops. Instructions were great. Pieces were labeled correct. For the price I cannot complain at all. My only complaint was shipping because my top of my dresser was cracked. See picture above. This is a fantastic dresser. If you lay pieces out before assembling and follow instructions it's a breeze to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Casey S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dresser but smells.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dresser with easy to follow instructions. The finish is more an off white, but I think it makes the character of it stand out more rather than being all white. The only issue is it has a VERY strong particle board smell that off gases throughout the House. This was placed in an upstairs bedroom and the smell made its way downstairs. It went away after a few days, but I might suggest opening the box in a garage and letting things air out before putting it together to bring indoors. I would place it in a nursery until letting it air out. Other than that great product !
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this for our baby's room and it's gorgeous. We've had lots of compliments. Easy to put together, we didn't have any damage issues, the drawers roll in and out very softly, and there's lots of room. I'm kind of jealous of my baby's furniture now. Might need to buy the whole bedroom set for our bedroom in the future.
customer_reviews.author: J. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Before you buy!
customer_reviews.text: The dresser and mirror look nice once assembled. Not high quality but serves the purpose in our seasonal home. It's built with composites and I don't see a piece of wood any. But still, no reason to hate it for what we need it for. Here comes the catch and the reason for the low rating. You had better be very handy and have at least one day to assemble the dresser and mirror! It came absolutely entirely unassembled. Directions were good and parts were there but WOW!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan F

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY AMERICAN MADE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with the quality of the nightstands I purchased from this manufacturer that I purchased the entire bedroom collection. It is sturdy well made and MADE IN AMERICA! I love the color, some reviews have complained it was yellow, all of my pieces are pretty off white slightly beige color. There is a bit of yellow where it has been made to look aged. Assembly is much easier with 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in medium/small room
customer_reviews.text: Needed a dresser in guest room that is smallish and can be rather dark, so we ordered the white dresser. I've had this on my wish list for months. We finally ordered it and we really like it. Size is great, it has a thin profile but has lots of storage for blankets, sheets, and other guest room needs. Husband put it together with no problems although it did take a bit of time. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gamzie

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture for the value
customer_reviews.text: My father was a cabinet and furniture maker and I am very very picky about my furniture. However, being a person with more appreciation than income I won't be able to purchase custom built furniture. This dresser was a surprise. It is heavy weight, well built and a great value for the price. I like that the drawer guides are sturdy and reliable. The two side doors latch very well and have taken some abuse over the year that we have had this. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Sela SS

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Beautiful finish
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Beautiful finish. Drawers slide well... Not clunkily like some other pieces we've bought from online vendors. The other reviews are right on regarding consyruction. The product comes in a million pieces and took my Fiance, an engineer, several hours to put together. I'm pretty handy myself and would have taken forever to figure it out. It's also in a VERY large and heavy box. Just something to keep in mind if, like us, you live in an apt building and need to fit it into an elevator. Also the delivery person stated the "freight guys" don't help you haul it so either pay the money to have it built for you upon delivery or have help ready.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not WHITE- more of a cream beige color
customer_reviews.text: This dresser was not too hard to put together and looks very nice. However, I gave it 3 stars instead of 5 because the picture shown is deceiving- color and the color description is off. It's more of a cream beige color not white. I was looking for WHITE.... I purchased the file cabinet to match and bookshelves at the same so at least they all match. Overall I am happy with the furniture just wished it was WHITE.
customer_reviews.author: Symon

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Made Cabinet!  Well Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is absolutely beautiful! It is a true antique white color and matches my dinette set perfectly! It is very heavy, of good quality wood, and well made. Brian, the installation serviceman, was respectful and capable. This very capable young man completed assembling the cabinet in just 65 minutes. So it was well worth paying for the service.
customer_reviews.author: Lee WolkeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Other than then that it is a great dresser very well built and looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: The package is very heavy so be prepared for that, I had to take boards out one by one and move them upstairs to my Master bedroom. Other than then that it is a great dresser very well built and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Joslyn

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive furniture line, I have four of the pieces....
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this whole set, I have this, and the armoire, and nightstand and tall two door cabinet. LOVE THEM. I demolished a drawer during put together (my fault) and Sauder sent me a new complete drawer immediately and no charge. Love this company and I love amazon. Of course you aren't paying a fortune and it's not hardwoods, but for the money, I am so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Crochet Momma

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and holds lots of stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Nice storage cabinet. Different size/type areas in the cabinet give lots of different options for storage. Looks nice too. I also bought the tall sewing cabinet and together they have really spruced up my craft room. Very sturdy, doors are well made. Finish is lightly distressed, looks a little "beachy".
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dresser to match a Coastal Room!
customer_reviews.text: Love the dressers, great price for the quality. Shipping left a couple marks on the merchandise, nothing too big, and they don't show much... BUT, I know they are there. Kept it from being a 5 star, not worth the hassle of having to ship these back. They do take awhile to put together, but go perfect in my coastal bedroom! Sauder products have really improved throughout the years! Very impressed with the looks of this! THE BOX is VERY HEAVY you will need two people to carry!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Gee-Reads

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is perfect for me. Holds alot of stuff! Gives the perfect cottage feel to my bedroom. Husband said it was easy to put together, just time consuming. He also used wood glue as he went. It arrived on time and undamaged. The box took the beatings well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser, just daunting assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, there are so many pieces it looks like a nightmare, but the directions are so good that it goes faster than expected. A great deal on a great dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lushing looking dresser
customer_reviews.text: This a lush looking piece of furniture. It fits perfectly in my guestroom. Be aware it's very heavy. Weights over a 100 pounds. Make sure when you assemble to put sliders on the bottom of the legs so you push it easily around the room. It also takes longer to assemble because of the doors, door hinges and the drawers but the instructions are clear. The result are great. I like it a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: BL Wilson

customer_reviews.title: NOT REAL WOOD BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: FROM THE PRODUCT DESCRIPTION: "This dresser is crafted with SOLID WOOD and provides ample storage space behind its two cabinet doors and within the four easy-glide drawers." UNDER THE "COMPARE TO SIMILAR ITEMS: "Material Type:Wood" DECEPTIVE ADVERTISING AND THE ASSEMBLY WAS SO DIFFICULT I HAD TO HIRE SOMEBODY TO ASSEMBLE IT FOR ME AT $100.
customer_reviews.author: Gal 220

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice size and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: did not take that long to put together, maybe 2 hours. The night stand is harder even though smaller. It is a very nice size and sturdy. I really love it. Drawers work perfect. Received it with no damage as well. We have the head board, side table and this dresser. Very nice set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Hoffer

customer_reviews.title: Prepare and you'll love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this dresser now for 2 years and two moves. VERY difficult and time consuming to assemble with one person. The boxes that come are very very heavy, so have them delivered when you are home so they can put it where you'll be building it. Be gentle with the finish, I'm having some of the paper roll up on some edges. Aside from that, no damage during moves despite size and weight, no loose screws. Very sturdy. I replaced the hardware with silver hardware and it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Sbeve

customer_reviews.title: What a steal
customer_reviews.text: To be sure, this is not a high end piece in terms of construction. But for the price it is a fantastic steal and was everything I expected it to be and more! It looks great, was not as difficult to put together as I was prepared for based on other reviews. My husband and I tag teamed this and had it together in no time! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeralyn J.

customer_reviews.title: We love the Sauder Harbor furniture
customer_reviews.text: We love the Sauder Harbor furniture. That is about all we have. Very nice stuff and well built. The instructions that comes with it needs some work, but not a big problem for me. I do love that they sent a full catalog with this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not so good in quality
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to assemble but manageable. The bigger problem is different pieces don’t fit together. The drawers are difficult to open after assembling. As shown in the picture, the space below and above the drawer are not symmetric. The only good part is it is very heavy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Weng

customer_reviews.title: Looks great assembled - damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Lots and lots of pieces. Take your time putting it together and it will look pretty good. It is very heavy so be prepared to manipulate it with care. The base shelf was cracked during shipping. This is one of the risks of shipping particle board that is not well padded in the box. Since the crack was inside the lower cabinet I kept it. Repacking in the box for a return was out of the question. It is like trying to repack 350# of pick up sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and appears to be well built at first. I've had mine less than a year. The center does not have support from the floor. I have books etc in the drawers. The center is sagging to a point where the doors and drawers are rubbing. I fear it will continue to get worse unless i figure out a way to fix it. A better built cabinet like this would be a lot more money. At the end of the day, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Crane

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Built it in an evening (3AM) - Plastic connectors and other short cuts and construction was not what I expected. Useful storage. Not nearly as good as the Coastal dresser I bought last year but I could not get another one - which is what I wanted. This compromise was just OK.
customer_reviews.author: Alain-Z

customer_reviews.title: Quality Dresser with flexibility for your stuff
customer_reviews.text: So I didn't want a traditional dresser, I have some storage cubes that I wanted to store and it took forever to find the right size and style... this piece did not disappoint. There were lots of pieces but if you are patient and organized it goes together pretty quickly with one person doing the build. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SheSailsinSoCal

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but...
customer_reviews.text: Ended up buying a sturdier piece of furniture from nebraska furniture mart for $100 less...looks nice but sags in the middle. We did not put anything on the top due to reviews we had read about the sagging. Looks like it is the weight of the drawers that cause the sagging. My husband is reinforcing the middle section to help with the problem but I don't see this piece of furniture lasting long. We've had it about 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Took 2 handymen ( I've used them before, and they know what they're doing) 6 hours to put the dresser, mirror, and 1 matching nightstand together ! Bought the matching Queen headboard, but will save it for another day. Thought I was saving money buying it online, but would have cost less to buy a set in the furniture store ! They are on another job, so won't get the whole thing together for another 2 weeks !! Directions were the size of a small magazine, and the headboard comes in separate sections that need to be attached. I live in CA, so at least I know it's earthquake proof-really HEAVY !
customer_reviews.author: YoMarg1

customer_reviews.title: He said the directions were very easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: My hubby thought this would come assembled. It did not. He said the directions were very easy to follow. We love the final product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Guest Room!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dresser! It IS very heavy, as other viewers have noted, but it's solid and the dresser drawers slide nicely. The directions are very detailed and easy to follow. In fact, my husband enjoyed putting it together. Looks great in our guest room!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it worth every penny easy to put together if you have time and patience very sturdy great weight
customer_reviews.author: Birdene Culver

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: While I am handy, I am a 5'2" woman who put this together by myself (had my neighbor help twice just to switch sides) in under 4 hours, and that was while attending to customers. Spent less than 3 hours dedicated to this. Directions are crystal clear and everything is marked great. Looks fabulous in my boutique.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: sturdy & very attractive
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly as it was described. It is functional, sturdy & very attractive.....everything we had hoped it would be!
customer_reviews.author: dSd

customer_reviews.title: It's a very cute dresser and I'm glad that I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, but I couldn't get the some of the drawers and the cabinet doors to open and close without scraping. It was fun to construct and the directions were clear. It helped that I had bought the nightstand and had put that together first. Per the color: I wish that it would have been a creamier white. A little too distressed, especially on the top. Very heavy dresser. Bringing the box in the house took 2 people. It was over 100 pounds!
customer_reviews.author: Kenbysk

customer_reviews.title: It looks good, quality if ok
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy box. I wasn't able to carry it inside the house by myself. I carried pieces by pieces. It took me a couple of hours to put it together; not all the pieces we're identified and I had a hard time with the bottom front piece. It looks good, quality if ok.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: It made room in my closet for summer clothes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This I bought to hold heavy tv on top and my winter clothes INSIDE
customer_reviews.author: Virginia D

customer_reviews.title: Good looking crap.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Buy it only if you don't plan to use it!!! It fell apart quickly. had a few T-shirts in the drawers and the bottom has fallen apart. complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Cat

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is gorgeous! Fairly easy to put together and very sturdy. Drawers and doors operate flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: LoLo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piec eof furniture
customer_reviews.text: We are so thrilled with this dresser. It arrived in perfect shape and it was put together in one long afternoon with no issues. It is setting in my plant room for storage and it a beautiful piece of furniture that I highly recommend. Thank you Amazon for this offering.
customer_reviews.author: DJ's Bike

customer_reviews.title: Good Storage
customer_reviews.text: Put this together alone. Was mainly easy to do. But was heavy to move. Used furniture slides underneath to move it around. Like the design and color. Cabinets on each side nice but maybe more than 4 drawers would have been a better option. Still love the dresser overall.
customer_reviews.author: Northwestretiree

customer_reviews.title: Fine but weird assembly
customer_reviews.text: The dresser looks great and functions fine, but the assembly of the drawers is very strange, and in fact it caused me to damage one of them before I figured out how it works. Pay special attention to the assembly directions for the drawers if you get them. It was unlike any other furniture I assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Davis

customer_reviews.title: A lot to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I like the finished product, but it was a lot of parts to assemble. The only thing I didn’t like about it was the way the finish is stuck to the item. It is not glued well and if someone were to walk by the corner and snag it - it would break off. I plan on trying to glue it better.
customer_reviews.author: KK7234

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was a bitch to get together but we’ll worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah H.

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser
customer_reviews.text: Although delivery was supposed to take around two weeks, the unit arrived within four days of placing the order. It was neatly packaged and very well preserved during shipping. It took quite a while to assemble, but the end product is very sturdy and looks great in my home. The assembly was well worth it and I have no complaints about this dresser!
customer_reviews.author: ZeeRod

customer_reviews.title: Some assembly required... like 2 hours worth.
customer_reviews.text: One of the doors, the left one, was a major pain to get adjusted, but otherwise looks decent. Couple hours of assembly required, and a helping hand is very helpful but not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Familycook

customer_reviews.title: Difficult
customer_reviews.text: This took 7 hours to assemble! My husband is a handy man and it took all his wits and patience to do this. I would not recommend this. Although it is sturdy I also bought night stand and it took 3 hours to assemble. Read the fine print, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ostuni

customer_reviews.title: Long assembly time. Looks great though!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking dresser. Quality is great for not being real wood. 100% assembly. 3 stars because it takes so long to assemble. 2 people about 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service ever!
customer_reviews.text: We bought several pieces from this company. GREAT QUALITY for furniture that you assemble yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Beardie 3  Mom

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: In a million pieces and a few dings... But very heavy durable piece once you finally get it together! Way better than I expected for the price after reading some of the negative reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to prime

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!! Love the design and the quality, the depth of the drawers especially. It's a very heavy piece of furniture which I like, took my time and put it together all by myself(61yr.old female) and very proud of how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Cairn

customer_reviews.title: Beware....Have to assemble yourself
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the dresser is nice the color is good but the instructions Sucks so hard. I'm mechanically inclined and it took me close to eight hours to assemble
customer_reviews.author: B $avin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to assemble. Don’t clean with damp towel. A little hard to move around.
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy. Two people needed to get in room. Could be assembled by one person but two better.
customer_reviews.text: Took my wife and I less then four hours to assemble. Very solidly made. We purchased several pieces of the Sauder Harbor View to redecorate office/den.
customer_reviews.author: DannyD

customer_reviews.title: Dresser is nice
customer_reviews.text: When it was delivered the delivery service must of dropped it. Had some gashes on the top. It makes my clothes smell like the inside of the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Stewart

customer_reviews.title: This is such a beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful piece of furniture, but be prepared to spend hours putting it together. Just don't get discouraged it's allot of work.
customer_reviews.author: Tree

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser would suggest a few upgrades
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking dresser! We use it for a media cabinet in our living room. My only issue is I wish the top drawers had the option to drop down so we could hide the media components in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assembly, after less then a year of owning. The dresser has came apart and started buckling. Its horrible, folding in on its self
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to put together but it looks expensive and is sturdy. I have a 55 inch television on it and clothes inside and I've never had an issue with tipping. Great piece!
customer_reviews.author: Reading Wahine

customer_reviews.title: Not only is this dresser a beautiful addition to my bedroom it is made with quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this dresser a beautiful addition to my bedroom it is made with quality materials. It is very functionable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece if you want something inexpensive that looks decent. It took a few hours to put it together (had a friend help me), and it looks great from a distance. When you get up close, you notice it's not the best quality but I don't care. I just wanted something that would last a couple of years, and that's it. Looks great in my room. I've read some people complaining about the color - it looks just like it does in the photos. If you don't like the color, you can easily and quickly paint it a new shade.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Miami

customer_reviews.title: A little labor for a great dresser at affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I was overwhelmed by all the pieces when I opened the box but found that the instructions made it easy to assemble. It looks just like the picture and very sturdy quality materials. All you need to assemble it is a hammer and a screwdriver! Not to mention about 3 hrs and some lotion for the blisters you might get from using the screwdriver so much! I assembled it alone so I would recommend two people tackled it together. Overall I'd say all you need is a little bit of labor for a great dresser at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my turquoise and white bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Quite lovely. Perfect for my turquoise and white bedroom. Solid wood, but hard to put together. I hired someone.
customer_reviews.author: pasofinopatty

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I have several pieces of Sauder furniture. I don't think you can beat it for the price. The pieces come well-packaged,the assembly instructions are clear, and the result is a piece of very sturdy furniture.. I'm very pleased with this dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hart

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy.  It It also has some sandy streeks, but looks good. .
customer_reviews.text: I liked how heavy and sturdy it is. I put a large mirror on the wall above it and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Nunley

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is ok. Fairly easy to assemble. The dresser is heavy and seems sturdy. The size is great. It is not wood and to me looks a little cheap. Too much trouble to send back. I am keeping it but not in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: copper

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture for the price. Looks lovely, and it was a breeze to put together. I am sorry, but anyone who says assembly is super complicated is crazy. I mean, it's not IKEA (no allen wrench in sight), but it's not that complex. I'm a 4'11" girl and I had it assembled in under 3 hours. By myself. This is my second piece of Sauder furniture (I also have the library with doors), and I'm very happy with the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: All composite wood and cardboard.
customer_reviews.text: The only solid wood is the feet. It's all composite wood and cardboard!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I love this furniture
customer_reviews.text: I love this furniture. It was easy to put together and is an excellent addition to my porch. It holds many different things and always looks clean and neat.
customer_reviews.author: Starr Maynard

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Works perfect. Based on other reviews I thought it would be more black. It is definately brown. Took me 5 hours to put together by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: a long assembly process and it scratches easily, buy yourself a furniture pen/marker, it looks ok.
customer_reviews.author: steele rage

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! I purchased the 5 drawer chest and so I was familiar with the Sauder instructions...so I laid out all the pieces with their screws first!!! ......this dresser took only 90mins. They look so expensive...and while I had the dresser about five weeks all drawers work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Val Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Dresser
customer_reviews.text: Really a solid dresser even down to the handles. Took 4 hours to assemble and I was very careful not to put the wrong length screws in the wrong holes. All in all a pain to assemble but totally worth it in the end!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael DiSandro

customer_reviews.title: ... View night stand about six weeks before and absolutely LOVED it- so we just ordered the dresser to go ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Harbor View night stand about six weeks before and absolutely LOVED it- so we just ordered the dresser to go with it. No problem assembling it at all - just follow the directions. Several have commented about the screws coming through the top - well, that's because you used the WRONG screws. The directions very specifically tell you which ones to use for each application. The dresser was even easier to assemble than the night stand because we were used to their method of assembly and it went quicker. We were amazed at the accuracy of all the pre-drilled holes and cuts. It is an amazing piece of furniture for the price. We highly recommend Sauder products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this dresser
customer_reviews.text: I love this dresser. It has spacious drawers and side cabinets that I can fit my sewing machine and supplies.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rotger

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made
customer_reviews.text: As with my review of the rest of this set it was a great buy very well built and heavy duty furniture Sauder really stepped it up.
customer_reviews.author: mb8873

customer_reviews.title: Love this dresser
customer_reviews.text: Love this dresser! I bought this dresser as well and the matching headboard and night stand and they are all great! Yes, the dresser took a few hours to put together but I am a 20 year old woman and I did it by myself! This set looks fantastic in my beach themed bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Payton Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece of furniture. It was packaged very well and looks great. It took about 3.5 hours to put together, very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Campmaster Tom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what i expected based on the reviews posted. Sturdy and easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: san

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy looking dresser. It took a while to put together, but it is nice looking furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M

customer_reviews.title: still a great looking piece
customer_reviews.text: not real wood. still a great looking piece. very difficult to assemble however.
customer_reviews.author: didi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together with 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the price. Easy to put together with 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Marina's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Put together today very flimsy. It is not what I expected. Also the color is more of a light beige. Waste of $300.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love but doors are really hard to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Love but doors are really hard to adjust. Still haven't gotten them. Also the drawers are decieving. They are not as deep as the outside part so there is considerably less storage then I was expecting. But it is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: RoseTyler910

customer_reviews.title: most important information, do not try to put it together yourself!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful piece of furniture but very heavy and I hired a handyman to assemble it , he has a background in carpentry and it took him 3 hours to put it together. Very difficult instructions and many pieces, so just be warned!!
customer_reviews.author: JOANN KARECKI

customer_reviews.title: Youth sized dresser is great for the price .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter’s room. It was easy to assemble and is heavy / sturdy. It is definitely a youth sized dresser. It is great for the price . No issues
customer_reviews.author: KBM

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Made of garbage materials. Crumbled apart as it was assembled. Worst furniture buy I ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Scott

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, but difficult and time consuming to put together.
customer_reviews.author: weavertv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a 2 man job. Im using it as a credenza for work and it fits the roll perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: The finish of the material is crap. I'll be surprised if I can try to ...
customer_reviews.text: The finish of the material is crap. I'll be surprised if I can try to make it last 2 years before I can't stand it anymore. The material is cheap , everything down to the screws. And when it came It had two pieces that were damaged. I didn't want to wait another month for a new dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice dresser for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice dresser for the price. Looks exactly like the photo. It's not your super high-end solid wood furniture piece, but it is defiantly nicer then anything at IKEA. It takes time to assemble but solid and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice dresser, good quality for the price, but have some damage Conner due to shipping
customer_reviews.author: Minh Vu

customer_reviews.title: Works great for storage
customer_reviews.text: They left unfinished holes and missed holes completely. I had to drill out new ones. Defiantly recommend using wood glue in between joints to make it sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted & very fast shipping. Be ready to spend time putting everything together, but instructions help greatly
customer_reviews.author: Myra L Baker

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Dresser
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, looks amazing with the 5 drawer chest. Love the color and style.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service & Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from Best Furniture Buys online at Amazon a few months ago in November. Love Best Furniture Buys, they have the best prices and always happy to answer any questions you may have. The dresser says salt oak and looks like some type of oak in the picture, but dresser is really a streaked gray taupe color. Beautiful and great piece of furniture. Thank you Best Furniture Buys!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Jay

customer_reviews.title: They are solid well made wood finished with great details like feet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this piece to match 3 other pieces - and adore them. They are solid well made wood finished with great details like feet, louvered doors and lovely knobs. Excellent and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and antiqued look
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and antiqued look. From a scale of 1 to 10, 10 being supeer easy to assemble... I would give it a 7. Good directions, lots of pieces.
customer_reviews.author: SFKent21

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of them so I am willing to ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the price. You do need to be very careful when screwing on the top. I read the reviews for this and even knowing what would happen if you scewed then in just a smidge to much we still managed to have a bump or two. Not a huge deal but still irritating. I love the look of them so I am willing to sacrafice.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Serpas

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look at, a nightmare to piece together
customer_reviews.text: I think that this dresser was needlessly difficult. I spent hours on the doors alone, until I finally went to Home Depot and bought screws that actually fit. Although each piece is referred to by letter in the directions, many of the pieces were not lettered. Aligning the drawers was a nightmare. One part arrived broken in half. It took two days to put together. Then, I had to take it apart because two pieces were facing the wrong direction. It's a nice looking dresser, but definitely NOT worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

product_meta.title: Sauder Harbor View Dresser, Antiqued White finish
product_meta.description: Color:Antiqued White FinishWe hope you like what you see. Sauder designers travel the world and bring back the best and latest in style, finish, and color trends. This inspiring world travel is evident in the cutting edge and innovative furniture solutions we offer to you!
feature_bullets: Safety tested for stability to help reduce tip-over accidents
Four drawers with metal runners and safety stops to keep you and your family safe
Quick and easy assembly with patented T-lock drawer system
Additional storage behind louver detailed doors for flexible storage options
Detailing includes solid wood knobs and turned feet for an added touch of class

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars237 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
